display_name: Total number of hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and with < 3% oxygen desaturation and associated with a desaturation of which the nadir > 90% oxygen saturation from type III home sleep apnea test
description:
Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events.

The definition of hypopnea events is consistent with the following clinical guidelines: American Academy of Sleep Medicine (AASM) Chicago 1999 standard. [Sleep 1999 (PubMed ID:10450601)]( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/10450601)

[Search for all AHI variables consistent with the same clinical guidelines within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/heartbeat/variables?search=chicago1999)
